name: Demolition Mission
description: You are on a mission to demolish all in sight. Tired of all the parking and driving games around? Time to try a new kind of game. Place the bombs cleverly in strategic spots of the building to bring it down below the red line. Donâ€™t let one wall standing with your mighty pyrotechnic equipment.  The demolition area is cleared for you to work your magic and make a insignificant pile of debris out of a old unfinished building that is soaring to the city sky.
